para.sentence: Let K(z,\zeta) be the solution of K(z,\zeta)=k\mathrm{Ai}\left(\frac{z+\zeta}{2}\right)+\frac{k^{2}}{4}\*\int_{z }^{\infty}\!\!\!\int_{z}^{\infty}K(z,s)\mathrm{Ai}\left(\frac{s+t}{2}\right) \mathrm{Ai}\left(\frac{t+\zeta}{2}\right)\mathrm{d}s\mathrm{d}t, where k is a real constant, and \mathrm{Ai}\left(z\right) is defined in ยง9.2.
Then w(z)=K(z,z), satisfies \mbox{P}_{\mbox{\scriptsize II}} with \alpha=0 and the boundary condition w(z)\sim k\mathrm{Ai}\left(z\right), if z\to+\infty.
